title: 1986년 Carroll 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Carroll. 판결일: 1986-05-05. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Gilbert Carroll
**판결일**: 1986-05-05
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 120 A.D.2d 541

## 판결문 요약


— Appeal by the defendant from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Queens County (Leahy, J.), rendered December 17, 1980, convicting him of attempted robbery in the first degree, upon his plea of guilty, and imposing sentence.
*542Judgment affirmed.
We have reviewed the record and agree with the defendant’s assigned counsel that there are no meritorious issues which could be raised on appeal. Counsel’s application for leave to withdraw as counsel is granted (see, Anders v California, 386 US 738; People v Paige, 54 AD2d 631; cf. People v Gonzalez, 47 NY2d 606). Lazer, J. P., Bracken, Lawrence and Kooper, JJ., concur.
...
